reviewText: The information was accurate however the narration was extremely boring and dull.  David Starkey's Monarchy was much much better.  I wish I could return it.
I really enjoyed this DVD and I will watch it more than once. The information that was given with movie is awesome
Amateurish production, but better narration (and audio quality) than Monarchy.  In my book, the best of the series is Charles I.
